constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 84 (Tuesday, May 17, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. C. SCOTT FRANKLIN of Florida:
H.R. 7798.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Congress is granted the authority to introduce and enact
this legislation pursuant to Article 1, Section 8 of the U.S.
Constitution.
[Page H5098]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

title: Prohibiting Abortion Industry’s Lucrative Loopholes Act
